trans-unit.source: Provides a XAML-friendly implementation of a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter" /> that filters on a single action.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma implementação amigável a XAML de um <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter" /> que filtra em uma única ação.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the action for the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a ação para o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />.

trans-unit.source: The action for the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />.
trans-unit.target: A ação para o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" /> to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" /> a ser comparado com o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" /> is equal to the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" /> atual é igual ao <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" /> especificado for igual ao <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" /> atual; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash da instância de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: O código hash da instância <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a message’s action matches the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action" /> of this <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a ação de uma mensagem corresponde à <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action" /> deste <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />.

trans-unit.source: A message’s action is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A> property of the message’s <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Ação da mensagem for especificada o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A> propriedade da mensagem de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The message to compare.
trans-unit.target: A mensagem a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified message’s action matches the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action" /> of this <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a ação da mensagem especificada corresponde à <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action" /> deste <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the action matches; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a ação corresponder; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A message’s action is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A> property of the message’s <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Ação da mensagem for especificada o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A> propriedade da mensagem de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The message buffer that contains the message to compare.
trans-unit.target: O buffer de mensagem que contém a mensagem a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the action of the message contained by the specified message buffer matches the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action" /> of this <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a ação da mensagem contida pelo buffer de mensagem especificado corresponde à <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action" /> deste <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the action matches; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a ação corresponder; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A message’s action is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A> property of the message’s <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Ação da mensagem for especificada o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A> propriedade da mensagem de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma representação de <see cref="T:System.String" /> do <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />.

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action%2A> property is set, its value is used to build the string representation; otherwise, the base class <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> value is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action%2A> estiver definida, seu valor é usado para construir a representação de cadeia de caracteres; caso contrário, a classe base <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> valor é retornado.
